import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'] }) export class RegisterComponent implements OnInit{ constructor(){} ngOnInit(): void { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } registerForm=new FormGroup({ name:new FormControl("",[Validators.required]), username:new FormControl(""), email:new FormControl(""), password:new FormControl(""), phonenumber:new FormControl(""), role:new FormControl("") }); registerSumbited(){ console.log(this.registerForm.value); } }

Role
